data.name: categoriesInfo
data.value: Here you can find a complete overview of all indexed categories. Simply click on a category to access the corresponding overview.

data.name: appInfo
data.value: Your overview of inflation in Austria.

data.name: noRecentPriceChangesText
data.value: There have been no price changes so far.

data.name: categoryInfo
data.value: Here you can see all information about the current category. Additionally, you can view current statistics and recent changes.

data.name: productInfo
data.value: Here you can see all information about the current product. Additionally, you can view current statistics and recent changes.

data.name: storesInfo
data.value: Here you can find a complete overview of all crawled stores. Simply click on a store to access the corresponding overview.

data.name: storeInfo
data.value: Here you can see all information about the current store. Additionally, you can view current statistics and recent changes.

data.name: noSubCategoriesText
data.value: There are currently no sub categories

data.name: uncategorizedProductsInfo
data.value: Help the Teuerungsportal by categorizing products, which are currently uncategorized.

data.name: chartInfo
data.value: The diagram illustrates the price increases over the past 30 days and aims to visualize whether companies are coordinating and adjusting certain products on the same days.

data.name: impressContent
data.value: This page serves solely for nonprofit purposes and does not pursue any profit-oriented business performance. No cookies or other personally identifiable information are stored. All data is for informational purposes only and is not associated with any online shops. Data errors are possible and subject to change.

data.name: welcomeText
data.value: Welcome to the Austrian Inflation Portal. Please note that this is a hobby project that directly extracts data from Austrian trade industries. Analyze your favorite products yourself and track the current inflation in real time.

data.name: performanceText
data.value: Unfortunately, it is known that the performance of this site is not the best. The reason for this is that the infrastructure, in order to scale well, is relatively expensive. If you like the project and would like to support it directly, you are welcome to leave a small donation on PayPal.

data.name: supportInfo
data.value: All supporters are mentioned in the impress.

data.name: supportersText
data.value: Here you will find a list of all supporters. A thousand thanks to everyone who financially supports this project and keeps this platform alive.

data.name: liabilityText
data.value: All shown data are only for reference and may contain errors with varying causes. Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

data.name: citationText
data.value: This platform solely serves the purpose of providing information and relies on the Austrian citation right, as no protected works in the form of images or audio are stored, accessed, or distributed from third-party sources. Only the price, article name, and product number are used under the following circumstances: 1. The purpose of price citation is for documentation and visualization; 2. A direct link to the product is provided as the source; 3. The scope is limited strictly to the mentioned purpose; 4. The citation exclusively pertains to the aforementioned points (price, product name, and product number); 5. Due to the fair use principle, no protected works of the operators are used to protect their rights.

data.name: cookieConsentText
data.value: However, only those that are truly necessary for your current session will be used. No trackers, no Google Fonts, or similar elements will be utilized.

data.name: noWorstChanges
data.value: Yay! No price increases in the last 24 hours.

data.name: topChangesInfo
data.value: This overview shows the up to 5 biggest price changes in the last 24 hours.

data.name: noTopChanges
data.value: Sadly, there have not been any price changes in the last 24 hours which would affect consumers positively.

data.name: createCategoryInfo
data.value: Create a new category. It will be added to a placeholder group automatically and can be found under "Nicht Bestätigt".

data.name: quoteText
data.value: (Translation) The establishment of its own price database by the federal government is considered by various experts to be of little benefit, as there are already numerous price comparison platforms in the market.

data.name: goodbyeInitial
data.value: It's unfortunately come to this. Longer than originally anticipated, I will be shutting down the inflation portal. The main reason for this is the following quote, which was published today:

data.name: goodbyeTextA
data.value: As some may already know, I had the honor of discussing with Mr. Minister of Economics, Mag. Dr. Martin Kocher. In this context, several measures to combat inflation were discussed. However, the main topic was a transparency law that would have required merchants above a certain size to input price data into a database provided by the Republic of Austria. Throughout this meeting, the importance was emphasized several times, as transparency platforms like the inflation portal can only function effectively when there is legal certainty. This is not currently the case. I have already received a fake legal letter once, but a lawsuit could have been filed against me at any time. Fortunately, this did not happen. Furthermore, grocery retailers are not obligated to publish price data, and they partially resist, intentionally or unintentionally, by making it more difficult to extract the data.

data.name: goodbyeTextB
data.value: As mentioned earlier, it has been repeatedly emphasized that a transparency law is urgently needed. I even offered my support in drafting a corresponding concept, and I did so free of charge. Unfortunately, this assistance was not accepted either. It has now become known that the ÖVP did not even consult with the coalition partner, despite promising to do so at the meeting "in the next few days". This is a slap in the face. However, what is even more outrageous is the fact that now the portal operators, including myself, are being portrayed as the guilty parties. This is a scandal. If one were to argue in this manner, what would come next? Will the police be disbanded because there are 3-4 neighborhood watch groups? Will schools be closed because there are also tutoring institutes?

data.name: goodbyeTextC
data.value: A capable government should be able to address a problem rather than simply saying, "There's already something in place," especially when it's legally in a gray area. A transparency law could have addressed many individual issues. For example, smaller retailers could have aligned their prices with those of larger ones to gain an economic advantage, potentially leading to a decline in the disappearance of small local shops ("Greislersterbens") and thus pushing prices downward. Therefore, it is all the more disappointing that NO party has been found to seriously advocate for this.

data.name: goodbyeTextD
data.value: All of this was not implemented. Instead, it appears that the blame is now being placed on the portal operators.

data.name: goodbyeThanks
data.value: Once again, a thousand thanks to all supporters. It's been a great time, and I've met many wonderful people. I hope the platform has helped you at least a bit, and that you'll continue to keep an eye on prices. Your support and dedication have truly been invaluable, and I'm sorry to have to close the platform. But your enthusiasm and ideas will always be remembered. Thank you so much for everything.
